articles.original_title: Granted this will happen, what do you think is the potential trade package?

articles.original_title: JJ Redick got a confusing response from NBA on non-goaltend call vs. Celtics
articles.summary: While everyone constantly argues about officiating and calls in basketball, the goaltending rule feels pretty clear. A defender can not touch the ball on its descent or interfere with the rim. So, in the third quarter of the Lakers-Celtics matchup, when Neemias Queta stuck his entire hand through the basket on a Deandre Ayton shot […]
